website_summaries.verdict: A unique option, though the colors aren't quite as neutral as other offerings on our shortlist.
pros: Ceramic green globe base with contrasting silver-toned rings
Thin, streamlined look and versatile 25-inch height
cons: The lampshades look a bit flimsy to some consumers

customer_reviews.title: Pretty lamps even though photos were kind of deceiving
customer_reviews.text: I was nervous if I'd like them in person because I thought the pictures looked more like glass (which I loved) than the ceramic that they are. However I do like the look of them anyway! The color is a light green with aqua stripes in between the bumps. There is a sort of cracked glass look to the ceramic too FYI. Not exactly what I expected but I love them anyway! Packaging was good - no issues there!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I couldn't have made a better choice in lamps for my bedroom
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't have made a better choice in lamps for my bedroom. I was a little concerned when I had to assemble them, but once I started it was quite easy. The color is just perfect. The lamp shades were to large for my vanity, but I put my other vanity lamp shades on them and they are perfect. I am very happy with these lamps and love looking at them every time I walk into my bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: Darlene Williams

customer_reviews.title: Safe packaging and they are just perfect for our master redo
customer_reviews.text: Safe packaging and they are just perfect for our master redo! Easy to put all components together...no problems. We had them unpackaged and turned on in just a matter of 10-15 minutes??? They are well made and lovely. [pretty much exactly as shown in photos(s)] Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie Reeves

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend this purchase
customer_reviews.text: These lamps look gorgeous in my bedroom. Very stylish and well made. I highly recommend this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: they look beautiful in my dinning room on my buffett table
customer_reviews.text: gorgeous simply gorgeous. they look beautiful in my dinning room on my buffett table
customer_reviews.author: MJ Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely beautiful lamps. The price was great. They even came with lightbulbs.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Krueger

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great customer service, had a small hiccup but they took care of real fast. Great , definitely recommend. Thankd
customer_reviews.author: Sung J. Shin

customer_reviews.title: I was disappointed in the quality of the lampshade top
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed in the quality of the lampshade top. One of the threads was striped and the shade is not completely secure unto the lamp. Also the top is made of cheap plastic not a metal.
customer_reviews.author: Arlene Majeski

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: These lamps are awesome! They look exactly like the picture and I love how they look in my room!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Book

customer_reviews.title: Nice!!
customer_reviews.text: Really pretty lamps. The color is kind of a mix of sage green and mint green. Easy to assemble. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Jenblairstown

product_meta.title: Safavieh Lighting Collection Stephanie Green Globe 25-inch Table Lamp (Set of 2)
product_meta.description: Jewelry for the home, the Safavieh Lighting Collection Stephanie Green Globe Table Lamp is as artful as a jade and silver necklace. With three celadon glazed ceramic balls set between silver-plated metal rings, this lovely lamp is topped with a traditional white linen shade. Assembly required, this lamp measures 12" x 12" x 25".
feature_bullets: This lamp features a white cotton shade
Crafted of green glazed ceramic and metal
Perfect for a living room, bedroom, den, library, study or office
Assembly required, this lamp measures 12" x 12" x 25"
